UserProfile.title: User Profile
UserProfile.description: Represents a user's public and private profile information.

photoURL.description: URL of the user's profile picture.

cardCount.description: The number of cards the user has created.

Card.title: Card
Card.description: Represents a card created by a user.

userId.description: The ID of the user who created the card.

prompt.description: The personalized prompt used to generate the card.

cardDataUrl.description: The data URL of the generated card image.

createdAt.description: The timestamp when the card was created.

/users/{userId}/cards/{cardId}.description: Stores the cards created by a specific user.

/users/shared/cards/{cardId}.description: Stores cards that have been shared publicly.
